name: Filip Murlak
content: Filip MURLAK Filip MURLAK I work at the Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics, University of Warsaw. I am a member of the automata group at the Institute of Informatics. I did my PhD in automata theory under the supervision of Damian Niwiñski. Later I was post-doc in the Database Group at the University of Edinburgh. My current research is in database theory and knowledge representation. You can have a look at my CV here. Contact data Uniwersytet Warszawski, Instytut Informatyki ul. Banacha 2, 02-097 Warszawa, Polska Office: 4580 tel +48 22 55 44 458 fax +48 22 55 44 400 fmurlak at mimuw dot edu dot pl Publications Stackless Processing of Streamed Trees, with 	Corentin Barloy and Charles Paperman, PODS 2021 PG-Keys: Keys for Property Graphs, with Renzo Angles, Angela Bonifati, Stefania Dumbrava, George Fletcher, Keith W.
